attributes.additional_details:
I think GMO food is bad anybody who genetically modified food is bad especially for the food circulation in this country.

It can destroy our crops and country environment.

We do not want GMO because it will destroy our future genetics and alter the future of the human species. Plus you do no know if it is safe.

If people come out with deformed babies because of someone modifying the food. that would no look good.
Things like this need to be considered. this mite be an extreme case but It first will modify the animals and they become more resistant to anything you put on GMO food. This mean you would have to make it stronger eventually which makes it even more dangerous and puts the stakes higher.

so that is why we should say no to GMO.
